definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: A 15-day heat wave raised temperatures up to 110 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 一場持續了15天的熱浪使氣溫升高到110華氏度。

sentences.english: As soon as it gets to about 100 degrees Fahrenheit, much less foam will form.
sentences.chinese: 一旦它達到大概100華氏度，更不用說會產生奶泡。

sentences.english: All you need is to freeze a pint of ice cream to -3706 F.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要把一品脫冰淇淋凍到零下3706華氏度。

sentences.english: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease large cookie sheet.
sentences.chinese: 預先加熱到350華氏度以上輕輕的塗上餅面上。

sentences.english: The marathon was run on a very humid , 90F degree day.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉松比賽當天溼度很大，氣溫高達90華氏度。

sentences.english: Researchers warmed up one group of mice to body temperatures of about 103 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員使得一組小鼠的處於103華氏度的環境中。

sentences.english: Steam is water that’s heated to two hundred twelve degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 水加溫到212華氏度就變成了水蒸氣。

sentences.english: The outside temperature is 25 degrees Celsius, 77 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 現在機艙外面的溫度爲25攝氏度，77華氏度。

sentences.english: It was hot, nearly 90 degrees in the noonday sun.
sentences.chinese: 天很熱，正午的陽光下，溫度高達近90華氏度。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
to spread out/(fig.) to share equally
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
